text: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مُخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَۗ إِنَّمَا يَخۡشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡعُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ

translation.en: And among people and moving creatures and grazing livestock are various colors similarly. Only those fear Allah, from among His servants, who have knowledge. Indeed, Allah is Exalted in Might and Forgiving
translation.id: Dan demikian (pula) di antara manusia, makhluk bergerak yang bernyawa dan hewan-hewan ternak ada yang bermacam-macam warnanya (dan jenisnya). Di antara hamba-hamba Allah yang takut kepada-Nya, hanyalah para ulama.713) Sungguh, Allah Mahaperkasa, Maha Pengampun
